articles.author: Sean Conlon, Pia Singh
articles.title: Stock futures are little changed after S&P 500 posts record close: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Major U.S. indexes climbed for a fourth straight session on Tuesday, led by names in the tech sector.
articles.content:
Stock futures were relatively unchanged on Wednesday after the broad market S&P 500 notched a record close.
Futures tied to the Dow Jones Industrial Average lost 25 points, or 0.1%. S&P 500 … [+2249 chars]

articles.title: US denies visas to ex-EU commissioner and others over social media rules - BBC
articles.description: Thierry Breton, the former top tech regulator at the European Commission, says a "witch hunt" is taking place.
articles.content:
The US State Department said it would deny visas to five people, including a former EU commissioner, for seeking to "coerce" American social media platforms into suppressing viewpoints they oppose.
